title: *True 3-Bedroom & 3-Bathroom Apt w/Private Roofdeck Terrace* 90 2B
posting_body: ["*I Can Show You ALL the Available Units in This Building And ALL of Rentopia's Properties ||", 'NO BROKER FEE*', 'We are the exclusive brokers for this building', '*True 3-Bedroom & 3-Bathroom Apartment w/Private Roofdeck Terrace*', 'The pictures are showing the actual available unit - I took them myself!', '*Extremely Unique Boutique Building in East Williamsburg*', "Broker fee of 1 month's rent ($5,800) is due at the lease signing", '*The Apartment Features:*', '3 Full-Size Bedrooms / *', 'Each Bedroom Has Its Own Private Full Bathroom* / Over-Sized Windows / Sunny Living Space Leading to a *Large Private Roofdeck Terrace* / Kitchen with Stainless Steel Appliances including a Dishwasher & Microwave / Elegant Eating Counter / Charming Exposed Brick Wall / High Ceilings / Hardwood Floors / AC Unit in Each Room / Built-in Music Surround System / Smart Virtual Doorman /', '*The Building Features:*', 'Gym / Ping Pong Table / Rooftop / Storage* /', 'A Step away from the J & M Trains at Lorimer St Station & the L Train at Montrose Ave Station / A Short walk to the G Train at Broadway Station /', '*Good credit history 700+ and a combined annual income of $232,000+ (=40x times the monthly rent) are required / Personal guarantors are welcome! /', '"Insuret" is accepted on a case by case basis*']
